scripts.create:html:report: marge --reportDir TestReport cypress-tests-report.json --reportTitle="Member Web App API Tests"
scripts.generate:html:report: npm run merge:reports && npm run create:html:report
scripts.test:mwa-api: npm run clean:reports && npm run mwa-api && npm run generate:html:report
scripts.test:mwa-api-pipe: npm run mwa-api && npm run generate:html:report
